bcbioRnaseq
  • Reference

Plot Mapped Reads

Plot Mapped Reads

plot_mapped_reads(object, ...)

.plot_mapped_reads(metrics, interesting_group, pass_limit = 20L,
  warn_limit = 10L, flip = TRUE)

# S4 method for bcbioRNADataSet
plot_mapped_reads(object, ...)

# S4 method for data.frame
plot_mapped_reads(object,
  interesting_group = "sample_name", ...)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments.
interesting_group

Optional. Category to use to group samples (color and shape). If unset, this is automatically determined by the metadata set inside the bcbioRNADataSet.
pass_limit

Threshold to plot pass color marker.
warn_limit

Threshold to plot warning color marker.

Value

ggplot.

See also

Other Quality Control Plots: plot_count_density, plot_counts_per_gene, plot_exonic_mapping_rate, plot_gene_detection_saturation, plot_genes_detected, plot_mapping_rate, plot_total_reads

Examples

data(bcb)

# bcbioRNADataSet
plot_mapped_reads(bcb)
#> Error in layer(data = data, mapping = mapping, stat = StatIdentity, geom = GeomHline,     position = PositionIdentity, show.legend = show.legend, inherit.aes = FALSE,     params = list(na.rm = na.rm, ...)): object 'pass_color' not found

# data.frame
metrics <- metrics(bcb)
plot_mapped_reads(metrics)
#> Error in layer(data = data, mapping = mapping, stat = StatIdentity, geom = GeomHline,     position = PositionIdentity, show.legend = show.legend, inherit.aes = FALSE,     params = list(na.rm = na.rm, ...)): object 'pass_color' not found
